amendment.description: Amendment provides use of funds to investigate or act upon applications for relief from Federal firearms disabilities under United States Code.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that such funds appropriated for BATF shall be available to investigate or act upon applications for relief from Federal firearms disabilities under United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Buck.
